TopicTitle: Mods not working, game stops loading.

Articles.Content:
Okey so I'm getting kinda frustrated now because nothing works, the game feels broken because it wont let me do anything with it. I'm tierd of the base game and I want to mod the game. 

But the problem is that the game wont let me mod it, I use the mod manager too but still not working. What the hell am I supposed to do? Am I missing something?

The game stops loading when I add the mod manager.

Module manager has to be of the right version. Can you add a screenshot of the gamedata file?

I got a feeling you downloaded the source code, not the manager itself.

16 hours ago, Exos1 said:

I use the mod manager too but still not working﻿.

What is this Mod manager you speak of?   CKAN?

And we'll need the KSP.log, it shows the errors that are causing your crashes:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/
